title: Why does ALMOST every Chinese player always play with a feed or carry playstyle?
body:
And when they can't carry, they tilt their face off the earth and start running it down mid. What's so great about this playstyle? 
I'm probably going to get called out for being "racist" but lets be real here, we see it all the time.

Someone tell me why is it that this carry or feed playstyle is so popular among Chinese people especially in ranked?

replies.body:
Most often the Chinese players you come across like that are because they got banned from the China server, and the OCE server is the next lowest ping.
For some reason over there you can only create one account because it's tied to personal details, so if you get banned you can only play by playing on another server.

So the toxic as fuck pieces of shit end up on our server and obviously haven't learned their lesson.

Yeah i agree with this. 

Most of the decent players who are positive but you can tell english isn't there first language are probably uni students, residents for work etc.

No watter what race, there is always good and bad people.
because sometimes white people like you don't deserve to {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Win, so those chinese players prefer Feed in game and let you suffer bcoz its obvious you are Racist
I'm not racist for pointing out an obvious trend when playing with CN players.
